triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: The core field applied to educational contexts to predict student academic performance.

triples.name: Educational data mining
triples.relevance: The specific interdisciplinary field combining data mining with education to predict student outcomes.

triples.name: Decision tree learning
triples.relevance: J48 (C4.5 algorithm) is used as one of the multiple classifiers for predicting student performance.

triples.name: Naive Bayes classifier
triples.relevance: One of the three classifiers used to improve data quality and predictive accuracy.

triples.name: Random forest
triples.relevance: One of the ensemble classifiers used for improved prediction of student academic performance.

triples.name: Apriori algorithm
triples.relevance: Used as a rule-based technique to identify association rules influencing student academic outcomes.

triples.name: Association rule learning
triples.relevance: Rule-based technique combined with Apriori and other methods to discover factors influencing educational outcomes.

triples.name: Ensemble learning
triples.relevance: The core contribution of the paper is using ensemble classifiers to improve predictive accuracy beyond single models.
